channel.title: CVE Feed for horearadu -- Mesmerize Companion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for horearadu -- Mesmerize Companion

item.title: CVE-2024-3494|2024-05-08T05:31:06.878Z -- horearadu -- mesmerize%20companion
item.description: The Mesmerize Companion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'mesmerize_contact_form' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.6.148 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
